CAMB 698 Final Paper Vincent Wu 2018-12-09 Chapter 1 Prerequesites This book will feature code and graphs produced using the R statistical language. Below are packages that will be used throughout this book. library(tidyverse) library(usedist) library(qiimer) library(reshape2) library(ggplot2) library(ape) library(Rtsne) The below code will load in the data that will be used in the next sections. load("data/poop_across_penn1.Rdata") # Create vendor/mice dataframe s_vendor_all <- s %>% filter(grepl("ARC Vendor Experiment", Experiment)) %>% rename(Vendor = Mouse_Source_Vendor) %>% mutate(SubjectID = factor(paste("Mouse", Mouse_Number))) %>% mutate(SampleType = trimws(as.character(SampleType))) %>% arrange(SampleType, Vendor, SubjectID) # Identify and remove suspicious samples suspect_SampleIDs <- c("Tac.33.CE.Day1", "Env.13.Stool.Day0") # Set final dataframe s_vendor <- s_vendor_all %>% droplevels() %>% filter(!(SampleID %in% suspect_SampleIDs))
